entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 over southern sections late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except south 50 gusting to 70 over southern sections early in the evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
